name: Word of Advice
description:
Quoting lyric from the song Bungsu by Kunto Aji.

“Sebelum kau menjaga, merawat, melindungi segala yang berarti.
Yang sebaiknya kau jaga adalah dirimu sendiri”.

These words remind me of that time when i was at home, sitting with my mom in the middle of the house, while having a conversation about life.

Before i start the journey
Before my feet steps out from the house
Before my new story begins

My mom always says 
“Remember, put yourself first before anything else”

When i listen to this song, i feel homesick. Therefore, I create this art inspired by it
